display_long_description:
The top-rated action-packed sports collection, filled with tons of quality content!

What the review pros are saying:
- Otterwordly: "I highly highly recommend Action Resort!"
- KaleahVR: "probably my favorite fitness game so far!"
- VivaHawaii: "The Most Fun Way To Get Fit On the Meta Quest 3!"

And fun it is! You'll be sweating without even realizing it.

[media]

Action Resort is a collection of games for all intensity levels – from low-key to high-energy fun.

• Boxing Practice: One of the most intense modes, featuring the most realistic and customizable trainer you'll find in the Store. For everyone into martial arts, a must-have!

[media]

• Smoothie Bar: Take it easy and relax while crafting delicious virtual smoothies – the ultimate chill-out mode.

[media]

• Ball Smasher Mode: The ultimate reflex trainer - try it out now!

• Mascot Punching Bags: Need to blow off some steam? Go wild with our tasty, friendly 'hurt me plenty' mascots acting as punching bags!

[media]

The best part of all? It's just a one-time price, no subscriptions needed.

Judging the reviews, you won't regret it; give it a try right now!
